views.markdown:
Update for iOS 10 - Fix possible crash in some third-party apps
- Fix dictation key not changing to EmojiKey for some non-English keyboards
- Add useful info in the preference
- Fixed bootloop issue for some users
- Automatically disable EmojiKey if current keyboard already has a native emoji key

- Full iOS 8 compatibility
- Added a cool Settings panel
- Added option to enable or disable EmojiKey
- Added option to clear keyboard cache
- Added option to skip EmojiKey when tapping the Globe button to change keyboards
- Added option to suppress language indicator on keyboard's spacebar
- Added warning text if user hasn't set Emoji keyboard as one of their active keyboards
- Clear keyboard cache after uninstalling tweak
